name: Cylinder (Loïc da Silva, Elise M., Rosenrips, Windory)
name_original: Cylinder (Loïc da Silva, Elise M., Rosenrips, Windory)
description:
People love listening to music. People love expressing their creativity. If you are here, then you may have found exactly what you were looking for. 

With your melodious music box, travel across the world and immerse yourself in the beauty of nature in order to make the purest sound resonate.

Cylinder - A short story about art, music and aspirations.

Game created for the sake of passion

Time : 1 month

Loïc da Silva : Game Design & Narrative Design

Wind : Programming

Elise Malbec : Game Art

Lucas Friche : Music & Sound Design
